title.content: Ninja Accountants: Balancing Books in the Shadows

image.description: A silhouette of a person in ninja attire sitting at a desk with a calculator and stacks of papers
A pie chart made of throwing stars
A briefcase opening to reveal smoke bombs and ledgers
A giant abacus with a ninja balancing on top
A skyscraper at night with a ninja scaling the side, holding a tax form
A tropical beach with palm trees and a hammock. Text overlay: 'Offshore Accounts?'
A medieval castle with a moat filled with receipts and invoices
A ninja star embedded in a wooden desk next to a stack of neatly organized folders
A group of people in business attire doing tai chi in a park. Text overlay: 'Team Building Exercise'
A random image of a pineapple wearing sunglasses. Text overlay: 'In Conclusion'
